cds::gc::ptb::Guard Class Reference

Guard. More...

#include <ptb.h>

Inheritance diagram for cds::gc::ptb::Guard:

Public Member Functions

 Guard (ThreadGC &gc)
 Allocates a guard from gc GC. gc must be ThreadGC object of current thread.
 ~Guard ()
 Returns guard allocated back to pool of free guards.
ThreadGC & getGC ()
 Returns PTB GC object.
template<typename T >
T * operator= (T *p)
 Guards pointer p.

Private Attributes

ThreadGC & m_gc
 ThreadGC object of current thread.

Detailed Description

Guard.

This class represents auto guard: ctor allocates a guard from guard pool, dtor returns the guard back to the pool of free guard.
